subject:
[cc-devel] [ cctools-Feature Requests-1702543 ] make sample browser
	for all media types
body:

Please note that this message will contain a full copy of the comment thread,
including the initial issue submission, for this request,
not just the latest update.
Category: ccHost
Group: None
Status: Open
>Priority: 6
Private: No
Submitted By: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
>Assigned to: Victor Stone (fourstones)
Summary: make sample browser for all media types

Initial Comment:
Currently the sample browser is primarily for audio. It would be great for it to be usable for other media types as it is an ideal way to search clip art, video snippets, fonts, etc, dependent on the usage.
